S.FORM: == mapalaway == cacay a lasubu izaw ku pitu a mihacaan, siwaay a bulad cacay a bataan caay demiad ayza,
== mapalaway == cacay a lasobo izaw ko pito a mihacaan, siwaay a bolad cacay a bataan caay demiad ayza,
